GauchoShout is a mobile application made for UCSB students, by UCSB students. 

Have a story from your crazy time in Isla Vista last night? Post it here for others to read! 
Need advice for school? Ask them and have other students respond! 
Or maybe you just need to SHOUT your thoughts... 

All of this can be done with GauchoShout. The best part is that you can choose to post as yourself or anonymously. 

So go ahead. Shout away, Gauchos!
